Title: The Disciple's Challenge
Description:
$n, I see great strength and great courage in you, and an unsurpassed purity of soul.

The hour is young, but I think you may be ready to face a greater challenge.

Go to the bottom of the stairs, and cross the bridge. There, you will find Jaomin Ro, one of our eldest students. Challenge and defeat him in honorable combat, and this first phase of your training will be complete.
CompletionText:
Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in getting up every time we do. Jaomin Ro knows this. He finds strength in every defeat.

You may yet learn that lesson.
RewardText: You truly impress, $n. It seems certain that the path of the $c is indeed the path for you.
